subject: British Open (Golf)
Golf
organizations: Royal Lytham & St Annes Golf Club
lead_paragraph: Despite good weather conditions during the first round of the British Open at Royal Lytham & St. Annes, the course’s 206 bunkers made their presence felt.
snippet: Despite good weather conditions during the first round of the British Open at Royal Lytham & St. Annes, the course’s 206 bunkers made their presence felt.
